name: The Greatest Showman - A Million Dreams
tuning: E A D G B E

content.text:
[Verse 1: Ziv Zaifman]
[ch]G[/ch]          [ch]D/F#[/ch]              [ch]Em[/ch]
I close my eyes and I can see
                   [ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]
The world that's waiting up for me
       [ch]D/F#[/ch]      [ch]C[/ch]
That I call my own
[ch]G[/ch]           [ch]D/F#[/ch]                 [ch]Em[/ch]
Through the dark, through the door
              [ch]C[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]
Through where no one's been before
        [ch]D/F#[/ch]        [ch]C[/ch]
But it feels like home

[Pre-Chorus: Ziv Zaifman]
[ch]D[/ch]                       [ch]Em[/ch]                [ch]C[/ch]
They can say, they can say it all sounds crazy
[ch]D[/ch]                      [ch]Em[/ch]       [ch]G/B[/ch]       [ch]C[/ch]
They can say, they can say I've lost my mind
[ch]D[/ch]                     [ch]Em[/ch]               [ch]C[/ch]
I don't care, I don't care, so call me crazy
[ch]D[/ch]                 [ch]Em[/ch]       [ch]G/B[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]
We can live in a world that we design

[Chorus: Ziv Zaifman]
        [ch]G[/ch]
'Cause every night I lie in bed
        [ch]D[/ch]
The brightest colors fill my head
    [ch]Am[/ch]                           [ch]C[/ch]
A million dreams are keeping me awake
   [ch]G[/ch]
I think of what the world could be
  [ch]D[/ch]
A vision of the one I see
   [ch]Am[/ch]                               [ch]C[/ch]
A million dreams is all it's gonna take

A million dreams for the world we're gonna make

[Verse 2: Ziv Zaifman]
[ch]G[/ch]         [ch]D/F#[/ch]          [ch]Em[/ch]
There's a house we can build
       [ch]C[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]
Every room inside is filled
     [ch]D/F#[/ch]             [ch]C[/ch]
With things from far away
[ch]G[/ch]            [ch]D/F#[/ch]       [ch]Em[/ch]
The special things I compile
           [ch]C[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]
Each one there to make you smile
      [ch]D[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]
On a rainy day

[Pre-Chorus: Ziv Zaifman]
[ch]D[/ch]                       [ch]Em[/ch]    [ch]D/F#[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]
They can say, they can say it all sounds crazy
[ch]D[/ch]                      [ch]Em[/ch]        [ch]G/B[/ch]       [ch]C[/ch]
They can say, they can say we've lost our minds
[ch]D[/ch]                     [ch]Em[/ch]            [ch]D[/ch]      [ch]C[/ch]
I don't care, I don't care if they call us crazy
[ch]D[/ch]              [ch]Em[/ch]      [ch]G/B[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]
Runaway to a world that we design

[Chorus: Hugh Jackman]
[ch]G[/ch]
Every night I lie in bed
[ch]D[/ch]
The brightest colors fill my head
[ch]Am[/ch]                               [ch]C[/ch]
A million dreams are keeping me awake
[ch]G[/ch]
I think of what the world could be
[ch]D[/ch]
A vision of the one I see
[ch]Am[/ch]                                  [ch]C[/ch]
A million dreams is all it's gonna take

A million dreams for the world we're gonna make

[Bridge: Michelle Williams, with Hugh Jackman]
[ch]Em[/ch]      [ch]Em/D#[/ch]         [ch]Em/D[/ch]
However big, however small
          [ch]A/C#[/ch]        [ch]C[/ch]
Let me be part of it all
            [ch]G[/ch]            [ch]B7[/ch]
Share your dreams with me
[ch]Em[/ch]         [ch]Em/D#[/ch]             [ch]Em/D[/ch]
You may be right, you may be wrong
                    [ch]A/C#[/ch]        [ch]C[/ch]
But say that you'll bring me along
                 [ch]G/B[/ch]
To the world you see
                         [ch]C[/ch]
To the world I close my eyes to see
            [ch]D[/ch]
I close my eyes to see

[Chorus: Hugh Jackman, Michelle Williams, together]
[ch]G[/ch]
Every night I lie in bed
[ch]D/F#[/ch]
The brightest colors fill my head
   [ch]Am[/ch]                              [ch]C[/ch]
A million dreams are keeping me awake

A million dreams, a million dreams

[ch]G[/ch]
I think of what the world could be
[ch]D[/ch]
A vision of the one I see
   [ch]Am[/ch]                                 [ch]C[/ch]
A million dreams is all it's gonna take
   [ch]C[/ch]                                        [ch]G[/ch]   [ch]D/F#[/ch]  [ch]Em[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]
A million dreams for the world we're gonna make

[Outro: Hugh Jackman & Michelle Williams]
                              [ch]G[/ch]  [ch]D/F#[/ch] [ch]C[/ch]
For the world we're gonna make

Song Name: Boulevard of Broken Dreams
Artist Name: Green Day

This is a simplified version of the song that is played using 4 Main Chords and 1 
Additional Chord at the end of each chorus. The additional chord is B7, though you 
can play E7 instead if you find B7 too hard to play for now.

This is recommended for beginner guitarist to practice and learn the song before 
moving to more advanced chord progressions and styling.

Transpose Up 1 half steps using the Ultimate-Guitar transposing tool to change the 
chords below so you can play with the original Green Day version without a capo.

content.text:
Thank you for checking out my version of Demons by Imagine Dragons
The strumming patterns is totally up to you, I just made some suggestions
Capo 3

[Verse 1]
          [ch]G[/ch]                      [ch]D[/ch]
When the days are cold and the cards all fold
          [ch]Em[/ch]                   [ch]C[/ch]
And the saints we see are all made of gold
            [ch]G[/ch]                      [ch]D[/ch]
When your dreams all fail and the ones we hail
          [ch]Em[/ch]                    [ch]C[/ch]
Are the worst of all, and the blood's run stale

[Pre-Chorus]
[ch]G[/ch]                       [ch]D[/ch]
 I wanna hide the truth, I wanna shelter you
[ch]Em[/ch]                         [ch]C[/ch]
 But with the beast inside, there's nowhere we can hide
[ch]G[/ch]                        [ch]D[/ch]
 No matter what we breed, we still are made of greed
[ch]Em[/ch]                       [ch]C[/ch]
 This is my kingdom come, this is my kingdom come

[Chorus]
[ch]G[/ch]                      [ch]D[/ch]
 When you feel my heat, look into my eyes
[ch]Em[/ch]                         [ch]C[/ch]
 It's where my demons hide, it's where my demons hide
[ch]G[/ch]                    [ch]D[/ch]
 Don't get too close; it's dark inside
[ch]Em[/ch]                         [ch]C[/ch]
 It's where my demons hide, it's where my demons hide

[Verse 2]
       [ch]G[/ch]                     [ch]D[/ch]
At the curtain's call is the last of all
         [ch]Em[/ch]                       [ch]C[/ch]
When the lights fade out, all the sinners crawl
        [ch]G[/ch]                      [ch]D[/ch]
So they dug your grave and the masquerade
          [ch]Em[/ch]                   [ch]C[/ch]
Will come calling out at the mess you made

[Pre-Chorus]
[ch]G[/ch]                           [ch]D[/ch]
 I don't wanna let you down, but I am hell-bound
[ch]Em[/ch]                          [ch]C[/ch]
 Though this is all for you, don't wanna hide the truth
[ch]G[/ch]                        [ch]D[/ch]
 No matter what we breed, we still are made of greed
[ch]Em[/ch]                       [ch]C[/ch]
 This is my kingdom come, this is my kingdom come

[Chorus]
[ch]G[/ch]                      [ch]D[/ch]
 When you feel my heat, look into my eyes
[ch]Em[/ch]                         [ch]C[/ch]
 It's where my demons hide, it's where my demons hide
[ch]G[/ch]                    [ch]D[/ch]
 Don't get too close; it's dark inside
[ch]Em[/ch]                         [ch]C[/ch]
 It's where my demons hide, it's where my demons hide

[Bridge]
[ch]G[/ch]                            [ch]D[/ch]
 They say it's what you make, I say it's up to fate
[ch]Em[/ch]                     [ch]C[/ch]
 It's woven in my soul, I need to let you go
[ch]G[/ch]                                [ch]D[/ch]
 Your eyes, they shine so bright, I wanna save that light
[ch]Em[/ch]                       [ch]C[/ch]
 I can't escape this now, unless you show me how

[Chorus]
[ch]G[/ch]                      [ch]D[/ch]
 When you feel my heat, look into my eyes
[ch]Em[/ch]                         [ch]C[/ch]
 It's where my demons hide, it's where my demons hide
[ch]G[/ch]                    [ch]D[/ch]
 Don't get too close; it's dark inside
[ch]Em[/ch]                         [ch]C[/ch]
 It's where my demons hide, it's where my demons hide

These are the chords for the live acoustic version of radioactive which is 
different to the recorded version. 

Chords: [ch]Abm[/ch],[ch]B[/ch],[ch]F#[/ch],[ch]C#[/ch]

You can also use Am,C,G and D if you down tune your guitar by a half step.


Note: If you wish to play it like the recorded version use the chords 
[ch]Bm[/ch],[ch]D[/ch],[ch]A[/ch],[ch]E[/ch] ( Or [ch]Am[/ch],[ch]C[/ch],[ch]G[/ch],[ch]D[/ch] with [ch]A[/ch] capo on the second fret)

The same chords are used throughout with very little change

Hope this helps!

[Intro]
[ch]Am[/ch] [ch]G[/ch] [ch]F[/ch]  [ch]E[/ch] x2

[Chorus]

[ch]F[/ch]                                  [ch]E[/ch]

[ch]Am[/ch]                          [ch]G[/ch]

    [ch]F[/ch]                                [ch]E[/ch]
And I cannot change you, so I must replace you, oh
[ch]F[/ch]        [ch]E[/ch]

              [ch]Am[/ch]
I thought you were the one
                        [ch]G[/ch]
Listenin' to my heart instead of my head
[ch]F[/ch]            [ch]E[/ch]
  You found another one
             [ch]Am[/ch]
But I am the better one
                  [ch]G[/ch]
I won't let you forget me
[ch]Am[/ch]                  [ch]G[/ch]

[ch]F[/ch]            [ch]E[/ch]

But I am the better one
                  [ch]G[/ch]
I won't let you forget me

[Verse]

You left me falling and landing inside my grave
[ch]Am[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]          [ch]F[/ch]     [ch]E[/ch]
I know that you want me dead
[ch]F[/ch]          [ch]E[/ch]            [ch]Am[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]
I take prescriptions to make me feel a-okay
[ch]F[/ch]         [ch]E[/ch]         [ch]Am[/ch]
I know it's all in my head
[ch]Am[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]            [ch]F[/ch]                  [ch]E[/ch]
I have these lucid dreams where I can't move a thing
[ch]Am[/ch]          [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]F[/ch]     [ch]E[/ch]
Thinking of you in my bed
[ch]F[/ch]           [ch]E[/ch]
You were my everything
[ch]Am[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]
Thoughts of a wedding ring
[ch]F[/ch]            [ch]E[/ch]          [ch]Am[/ch]
Now I'm just better off dead
[ch]Am[/ch]
I'll do it over again
[ch]G[/ch]
I didn't want it to end
[ch]F[/ch]
I watch it blow in the wind
                [ch]E[/ch]
I should've listened to my friends
 [ch]Am[/ch]
  Did this shit in the past
[ch]G[/ch]
But I want it to last
[ch]F[/ch]                            [ch]E[/ch]
You were made outta plastic, fake
[ch]F[/ch]                        [ch]E[/ch]
I was tangled up in your drastic ways
[ch]Am[/ch]                                    [ch]G[/ch]
Who knew evil girls had the prettiest face?
[ch]F[/ch]                            [ch]E[/ch]
You gave me a heart that was full of mistakes
[ch]Am[/ch]
I gave you my heart and you made heart break

[ch]Am[/ch]          [ch]G[/ch]
You made my heart break
[ch]F[/ch]                 [ch]E[/ch]

These are the chords the sheet music for Aerosmith's "Dream On" uses.  The
music was arranged for piano/vocal/ guitar, which means the fingerings for
the guitar chords are completely off.  Use your favorite chord dictionary
to find the right fingerings.  

"|" stands for the bar line between measures.  There are two chords to a 
measure for most of this song.  For the intro, alternate between the chord
and the bass note C.

Song: "Dream On"

NOTE: Okay, I know these aren't the chords of what's on the album. Believe me. I am a
huge Aerosmith fan and I should know their stuff. However, I found a way for beginners
to play the song if you don't want to worry about the real complicated chords/tabs
(sounds best Capo 2nd fret) it takes to play the song correctly:

[Verse 1]
[ch]Em[/ch]                           [ch]G[/ch]
Everytime that I look in the mirror
[ch]Dsus[/ch]                                [ch]Asus[/ch]
All these lines on my face gettin' clearer
[ch]Em[/ch]
The past is gone
[ch]G[/ch]
It went by like **dusk** to dawn
[ch]Dsus[/ch]
Isn't that the way
[ch]Asus[/ch]
Everybody's got their dues in life to pa
[ch]Em[/ch]                  [ch]G[/ch]
Yeah, I know nobody knows
[ch]Dsus[/ch]                        [ch]Asus2[/ch]
where it comes and where it goes
[ch]Em[/ch]                      [ch]G[/ch]
I know it's everybody's sin
[ch]Dsus[/ch]                         [ch]Asus2[/ch]
You got to lose to know how to win

[Bridge]
[ch]Em[/ch]
Half my life
[ch]G[/ch]
is in books' written pages
[ch]Dsus[/ch]
Lived and learned from fools and
[ch]Asus[/ch]
from sages
[ch]Em[/ch]
You know it's true
[ch]G[/ch]                   [ch]Dsus[/ch]          [ch]Asus2[/ch]
All the things come back to you

[Chorus]
[ch]Em[/ch]                 [ch]G[/ch]
Sing with me, sing for the year
[ch]Dsus[/ch]                            [ch]Asus2[/ch]
Sing for the laughter, sing for the tears
[ch]Em[/ch]                 [ch]G[/ch]
Sing with me, if it's just for today
[ch]Dsus[/ch]                                    [ch]Asus2[/ch]
Maybe tomorrow, the good Lord will take you away

[Chorus]
[ch]Em[/ch]                 [ch]G[/ch]
Sing with me, sing for the year
[ch]Dsus[/ch]                            [ch]Asus2[/ch]
Sing for the laughter, sing for the tears
[ch]Em[/ch]                 [ch]G[/ch]
Sing with me, if it's just for today
[ch]Dsus[/ch]                                    [ch]Asus2[/ch]
Maybe tomorrow, the good Lord will take you away
